name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

keyEvents.title: Hit & Dead Ball Game
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats and Foxy Pirates compete in a pirate dodgeball game as part of the Davy Back Fight rematch.
keyEvents.significance: Serves as the setting for the second event in the three-coin Davy Back Fight, showcasing the island's use as a competition venue.

keyEvents.title: Foxy Pirates Win First Round
keyEvents.description: The Foxy Pirates win the dodgeball match, gaining an early advantage in the rematch.
keyEvents.significance: Continues the ongoing competition at this location between the two pirate crews.

description: A unique island with extremely long landmasses separated by ocean, resembling rings. It serves as the location for the Davy Back Fight between the Straw Hat Pirates and Foxy Pirates.
geographicFeatures: Competition grounds for Davy Back Fight games
affiliation: Neutral territory used for pirate games
significance: Long Ring Long Land is significant as the setting for the Davy Back Fight arc, where the unique pirate tradition of competing for crew members is showcased. The island's unusual geography reflects the quirky nature of this arc.

statusHistory.description: Island discovered by Straw Hats and used as Davy Back Fight venue

trivia: The island's name comes from its distinctive long, ring-shaped geography
It is the primary setting for the Long Ring Long Land Arc
The island is sparsely populated and primarily used for the Davy Back Fight tradition
